level.heading: Persons authorized to act in relation to international will; eligibility; recognition by authorizing agency.
level.text: Individuals who have been admitted to practice law before the courts of the District of Columbia and who are in good standing as active law practitioners in the District, are hereby declared to be authorized persons in relation to international wills.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 18-701.
